cause.description:
We all know how great North Dakota State University is and we want to share this with others.
This cause is about the promotion and improvement of everything NDSU.
How can NDSU be better marketed?
What can be done to improve NDSU?
What do the students want to see?
...
If you can think of anything else to add or change let me know.
Sorry if you get more then one invite... this "cause" addition to facebook has been having some issues
.
1. Improve North Dakota State University
2. Solicit suggestions and recommendations by the student body
cause.mission: Promote and Improve North Dakota State University
cause.name: North Dakota State University
